text:
is there a way to use html/images in the default button module instead of just text? Right now I have a link that is static in the template but want to convert to use the button module so that it can be editable, but because it has an image I'm having some difficulty.

```<a href="/packages-and-pricing">{% text "section_1_button_1" label="Section 1 Button 1", no_wrapper=True, value="Packages & Pricing" %} <img src="{% image_src 'section_1_image_1' label='Section 1 Image 1', src={{ get_asset_url('../images/arrow_right_white.svg') }}, no_wrapper=True %}" alt="arrow"></a>```
